snippet: A former Chinese mining magnate with suspected links to the eldest son of retired security tsar Zhou Yongkang has denied leading a 36-member gang on a crime spree of murder and gun-running over the past two decades....

headline.print_headline: Former China Mining Boss Denies Charge of Leading Gang
headline.main: Former China Mining Boss Denies Charge of Leading Gang

lead_paragraph: A former Chinese mining magnate with suspected links to the eldest son of retired security tsar Zhou Yongkang has denied leading a 36-member gang on a crime spree of murder and gun-running over the past two decades.
